resources.string: Choose a tone that should go off as a reminder 15 seconds prior to the start of the call

➔ This application allows you to set automatic outgoing calls on a specified time and day of the week. You can also use this app to schedule conference calls. Here is a sample format: 18005555555,55555#,55555, where 18005555555 is the conference number, 55555# is the meeting id followed by hash (if required after dialing your pin), and 55555 is the password. In other words separate any pins required with a comma (",").
➔ Once the call initiates, you have the number of seconds specified in settings to cancel the call or start it. If you do not do anything, the call will automatically dial when the timer hits 0.
➔ The On and Off button can be used to turn on and off a call. The call now button allows you to dial the number.
Would you like to delete this call?
